api.reader.nesslab.utils

Class ConnectReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.reader.nesslab.utils.ConnectReader

  • public class ConnectReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is responsible for open connection and to send messages for the hardware Reader Nesslab.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection()
      Method used for to close connection with the hardware reader.
      java.net.Socket getConnection()
      Method used for to return the socket of connection with the reader.
      static ConnectReader getInstance(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      Method used for to return a connection with the reader.
      java.lang.String getResponse()
      Method used for to return a response of hardware reader.
      boolean hasResponse()
      Method used for to return if exists any response in buffer of reader.
      void send(java.lang.String message)
      Method used for to send a message for the reader, following the specification of proprietary protocol.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectReader getInstance(java.lang.String ip,
                        int port)
                                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Method used for to return a connection with the reader. The method is used exclusively for API Facade.
        Parameters:
        ip - is the IP of Reader.
        port - is the port of connection with o Reader, by default is 5578.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Is trown when the host not found.
        java.io.IOException - Is trown when any failure I/O ocurred.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String message)
        Method used for to send a message for the reader, following the specification of proprietary protocol. The method is used exclusively for API Facade.
        Parameters:
        message - is the message according with the protocol.

      • getResponse

        public java.lang.String getResponse()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Method used for to return a response of hardware reader.
        Returns:
        response of hardware reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • hasResponse

        public boolean hasResponse()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Method used for to return if exists any response in buffer of reader.
        Returns:
        true if exists any response, false if not exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Is trown when any failure I/O ocurred.

      • getConnection

        public java.net.Socket getConnection()
        Method used for to return the socket of connection with the reader.
        Returns:
        Socket connection with reader.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Method used for to close connection with the hardware reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Is trown when any failure I/O ocurred.
